wrynn:dialog_stage_0.content: Hello! I see you stumbled in without knocking, that's great!

wrynn:dialog_stage_1.content: Joking of course, but hey, since you're here I could use your help.

wrynn:dialog_stage_2.content: Well, recently, I went down into my cellar, and to my surprise a few undesirable critters decided to move in! In my haste to get the hell out of there I left behind my recipe book.

wrynn:dialog_stage_3.content: If you go down there and retrieve it for me I could provide you with the best food you've ever had! Of course I can provide you with some weapons, I'm not that crazy (yet)

wrynn:dialog_stage_4.content: Great! Walk over to my storage, I have a weapon and some food in there. Come back and speak with me once you have them.
wrynn:dialog_stage_4.incompleteContent: My storage is unlocked, feel free to go grab your items.

wrynn:dialog_stage_5.content: You got them? Good! The cellar is right outside, before you go make sure the pull the lever over there to release the gate.

wrynn:dialog_stage_6.content: Please hurry. I'm dying without my daily indulgence of bread.

wrynn:dialog_stage_7.content: You found it! You keep those things you got from me, as a special thanks.

wrynn:dialog_stage_8.content: You come back sometime if you need anything, I'll always be around.
